* To collect your tickets from the INOX Box Office, it is mandatory to present the debit/credit card used by you to book tickets along with the booking confirmation (SMS/Computer printout). Amex cards are also valid.
* To counter unforeseen delays, please collect your tickets half an hour before showtime.
* Kindly collect your tickets prior to showtime.
* Tickets purchased for a particular multiplex are valid for that multiplex only.
* Rights of admission reserved.

* Entry is allowed only for valid ticket holders.
* In case a ticket is lost or misplaced, a duplicate ticket cannot be issued.
* The holder of a physical ticket is deemed to be the owner of the ticket.
* Tickets purchased online are not eligible for discounts, schemes or promotions of any kind.
* Individuals below the age of 18 years cannot be admitted for movies certified ``A``. Please carry proof of age for movies certified (A).
* Children aged 3 years and above will require a separate ticket.
* Outside eatables, beverages, chewing gum, cameras, electronic items, weapons, cigarettes, lighters, matchsticks, gutkha, pets, laptop bags are strictly prohibited.
* Ticket holders are required to abide by the policies laid down by the INOX Management.
* Decision(s) taken by INOX shall be final and binding.
* 3D Glasses are chargeable (refundable/non-refundable) as per individual cinema policies. Some locations 3D charges may be separately collected at Cinema.
